channel.title: No-ip
channel.description: Hey, How come everytime i change the client ip to my no-ip it doesnt work but when i change no-ip to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 it works? I portfowared correctly. If you need i have team viewer and skype! thanks!

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

God bless you, you saved me from alot of thinking ^^^^^^^ I love you homo all the way.
Once i get 15+ rep ill rep you (;

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

[quote=“sex-scape owner, post:2, topic:418545”]you cannot connect to your own ip adress using a redirected one.

you wouldnt send yourself a message through the post. no-ip only redirects your dns to your ip adress.

if you dont understand

YOU need 127.0.0.1
OTHER PEOPLE need the no-ip[/quote]
So what your saying is i change the clients ip to my no-ip and then i get the client give it too my friend and change it back to 127.0.0.1? to make it work?

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

www.canyouseeme.org

You can’t always connect to your no-ip. My old router allowed me to do that, but I got this new one and its all secure and what not, so I can’t connect to my no-ip which is a pain in the ass when releasing new clients because I forget about the 127.0.0.1 and people complain …

So yeah, canyouseeme.org will tell you if its open or not, and you can’t always connect to your no-ip.

Read full topic
